perturbation.original_text: Section 2. Appointment and Obligations of the Remarketing Agent. (a) Appointment. The Fund hereby appoints [●], and [●] hereby accepts such appointment, as the exclusive Remarketing Agent of the VRRM-MFP Shares for the Variable Rate Remarketed Mode for the purpose of establishing on each Business Day the Dividend Rate in respect of the VRRM-MFP Shares and, in connection with a tender, remarketing such VRRM-MFP Shares on behalf of the Beneficial Owners or Holders thereof, as applicable, and calculating the Purchase Price therefor, among other things; and performing such other duties as are assigned to the Remarketing Agent in the Supplement, all pursuant to the procedures set forth in the Supplement and this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Section 2. Appointment and Obligations of the Remarketing Agent. (a) Appointment. The Fund hereby appoints [●], and [●] hereby accepts such appointment, as a Remarketing Agent of the VRRM-MFP Shares for the Variable Rate Remarketed Mode for the purpose of establishing on each Business Day the Dividend Rate in respect of the VRRM-MFP Shares and, in connection with a tender, remarketing such VRRM-MFP Shares on behalf of the Beneficial Owners or Holders thereof, as applicable, and calculating the Purchase Price therefor, among other things; and performing such other duties as are assigned to the Remarketing Agent in the Supplement, all pursuant to the procedures set forth in the Supplement and this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'exclusive Remarketing Agent' is changed to 'a Remarketing Agent'. This introduces ambiguity because it becomes unclear whether other Remarketing Agents can be appointed and what the rights and responsibilities are if multiple agents exist, potentially contradicting other sections assuming single agent.

perturbation.original_text: Section 11. Remarketing Agent's Performance; Duty of Care. (a) The duties and obligations of the Remarketing Agent shall be determined solely by the express provisions of this Agreement and the Supplement. No implied covenants or obligations shall be read into this Agreement, or the Supplement. In the absence of bad faith on the part of the Remarketing Agent, the Remarketing Agent may conclusively rely upon any document furnished to it, which purports to conform to the requirements of this Agreement and the Statement, as to the truth of the statements expressed in any of such documents. The Remarketing Agent shall be protected in acting upon any document or communication reasonably believed by it to have been signed, presented or made by the proper party or parties. The Remarketing Agent shall incur no liability to the Fund, the Investment Adviser, the Calculation and Paying Agent or to any Beneficial Owner (or its Agent Member) or any Holder of the VRRM-MFP Shares in its individual capacity or as Remarketing Agent for any action or failure to act, in connection with its duties under this Agreement and the Supplement or otherwise, except as a result of bad faith, gross negligence or willful misconduct on its part.
perturbation.changed_text: Section 11. Remarketing Agent's Performance; Duty of Care. (a) The duties and obligations of the Remarketing Agent shall be determined solely by the express provisions of this Agreement and the Supplement. Implied covenants or obligations may be read into this Agreement, or the Supplement. In the absence of bad faith on the part of the Remarketing Agent, the Remarketing Agent may conclusively rely upon any document furnished to it, which purports to conform to the requirements of this Agreement and the Statement, as to the truth of the statements expressed in any of such documents. The Remarketing Agent shall be protected in acting upon any document or communication reasonably believed by it to have been signed, presented or made by the proper party or parties. The Remarketing Agent shall incur no liability to the Fund, the Investment Adviser, the Calculation and Paying Agent or to any Beneficial Owner (or its Agent Member) or any Holder of the VRRM-MFP Shares in its individual capacity or as Remarketing Agent for any action or failure to act, in connection with its duties under this Agreement and the Supplement or otherwise, except as a result of bad faith, gross negligence or willful misconduct on its part.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'No implied covenants or obligations shall be read into this Agreement, or the Supplement' to 'Implied covenants or obligations may be read into this Agreement, or the Supplement' creates a direct contradiction. This now opens the door for the Remarketing Agent to have different, and potentially conflicting obligations than what is specifically outlined in the contract.

perturbation.original_text: Section 5. Resignation, Suspension and Removal of the Remarketing Agent. (a) The Remarketing Agent may resign and be discharged from its duties and obligations hereunder with respect to the VRRM-MFP Shares by giving 90 days' prior written notice to the Fund and the Calculation and Paying Agent.
perturbation.changed_text: Section 5. Resignation, Suspension and Removal of the Remarketing Agent. (a) The Remarketing Agent may resign and be discharged from its duties and obligations hereunder with respect to the VRRM-MFP Shares by giving 30 days' prior written notice to the Fund and the Calculation and Paying Agent.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the notice period for resignation from 90 to 30 days creates conflict with other clauses relying on this value. Now the contract has a shorter timeline which could affect the Fund's operational activities.
